:::config { "language": "javascript", "theme": "cobalt2" }
CustomRenderer.prototype.matchedRangeModifier = function (content, prefix = '') {
    let pattern = new RegExp(escapeRegex(prefix) + ':?((start|end|all|-?[0-9]+)(,-?[0-9]+)?)?', 'i');

    return content.match(pattern);
}
:::expectation
<pre class='phiki language-javascript cobalt2' style='background-color: #193549;color: #fff;'><code data-theme='cobalt2' data-lang='javascript' class='torchlight' style='--theme-selection-background: #027dff'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #aaa; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: #80ffbb;">CustomRenderer</span><span class="token" style="color: #e1efff;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #80ffbb;">prototype</span><span class="token" style="color: #e1efff;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #ffc600;">matchedRangeModifier</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #ff9d00;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #fb94ff;">function</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #ffee80;">(</span><span class="token" style="color: #e1efff;">content</span><span class="token" style="color: #e1efff;">,</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #e1efff;">prefix</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #ff9d00;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #92fc79;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #92fc79;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #ffee80;">)</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #e1efff;">{</span><span class="token">

:::end
